definition: To produce a sound caused by grinding or crunching, typically associated with teeth or other hard objects coming into contact. It is commonly used to describe the noise made when someone clenches their teeth tightly or when two hard surfaces rub against each other with a rough, grinding sound.

examples.german: Die Tür knirschte, als sie geöffnet wurde.
examples.english: The door creaked as it was opened.

examples.german: Der Schnee knirschte unter meinen Füßen.
examples.english: The snow crunched under my feet.

examples.german: Er knirschte mit den Zähnen vor Wut.
examples.english: He ground his teeth in anger.

examples.german: Das Holz knirschte, als es zersägt wurde.
examples.english: The wood splintered as it was sawed.

examples.german: Die Bremsen des Autos knirschten laut.
examples.english: The brakes of the car screeched loudly.
